name: A Bucket Filled With Sand
description:
Come down to the beach for a short illustrated text adventure, what kind of castle will you rule over?

Best played in fullscreen.

Note: To restart the game, please use the "refresh" button in your browser (I am trying to fix the problem with the in game button)

A C Godliman is a UK based illustrator making a tentative foray into interactive fiction, A Bucket Filled With Sand is their first completed and published game and was created using Twine.
